scripts.test:browserstack: npm run clean && browserstack-node-sdk playwright test --config=playwright.browserstack.config.js
scripts.test:local: npm run clean && playwright test --config=playwright.local.config.js && npm run report && allure open allure-report
scripts.test:local:browserstack: npm run clean && browserstack-node-sdk playwright test --config=playwright.local.browserstack.config.js --browserstack.config=browserstack.local.yml && npm run report && allure open allure-report
scripts.setup:husky: node -e "try { (await import('husky')).default() } catch (e) { if (e.code !== 'ERR_MODULE_NOT_FOUND') throw e }" --input-type module
